name: Dungeon Knights
description:
Made for 7drl jam 2020.

The game uses simple procedural dungeon generation like the ones in Binding of Isaac

Story:

Traverse the dungeons and rescue your dog from the kidnappers

Controls:

WASD keys
Movement
Left Click (mouse)
Attack
